Translations.Text: Om'me avanu (karun) tanna vaibhavadondige tanna janangadavara munde horatanu. Aga, kevala i lokada badukannu bayasiddavaru ‘‘karunanige nidalagiruvudellavu nam'ma bali iddiddare estu cennagittu! Avanu khandita maha bhagyavanta!’’ Ennatodagidaru

adare jnanavantaru helidaru; ‘‘nim'ma sthitiyu socaniyavagide. Satyavannu nambida hagu satkarma madidavana palige, allahanu niduva pratiphalave (idellakkinta) sresthavagide mattu adu sahanasilarige matra siguttade.’’

Konege navu ata (karun)nannu mattu avana nivasavannu bhumiyalli adumi bittevu. Aga allahana horatu bere yava padeyu avana neravige labhyaviralilla matttu tanage tane neravagalikku avanige sadhyavagalilla

ninneyavaregu avana sthanamanakkagi asepaduttiddavaru belagadaga hela todagidaru; ayyo allahanu sampattannu tanna dasara paiki tanicchisidavara palige visalagolisuttane mattu simitagolisibiduttane. Nam'ma mele allahanu krpe torade iddiddare, avanu nam'mannu (bhumiyolage) adumi biduttiddanu. Estondu satya! Krtaghnaru endu vijayigalaguvudilla
idu paralokada nele. Bhumiyalli doddastike mereyalu mattu asanti habbalu bayasadavarigagi navidannu misalagittiruvevu. Antima saphalyavu dharmanistharige seride
Satkaryagalannu tandavanige adakkinta sresthavadudu sigalide. Innu, papakrtyagalannu tandavanu – intaha papakrtyagalannu maduvavarige avaru maduttidda krtyagaliganusaravada pratiphalave sigalide

(dutare,) kur‌anannu nimage kaddayagolisidavanu khanditavagiyu nim'mannu sukta nelege maralisuvanu. Heliri; margadarsanavannu tandiruvavanu yaru mattu yaru spastavagi daritappiruvavanembudannu nanna odeyanu cennagi ballanu
